::::

::: {.notes}
* After PhD, did a brief stunt at Mathworks before getting hired at
  - Prof. Siciliano's group at University of Naples, Federico II as a postdoctoral researcher.
  - hired to help with control system design for the RoDyMan project -- (EU) nonprehensile robotic manipulation.
  - Worked on PBC for underactuated/nonprehensile robots and geometric motion planning for tossing and catching
* Spent a second year of postdoc at MIT in Russ Tedrake's group.
  - Worked on modeling and control of soft robotic systems.
  - Video shows modeling a soft end-effector w/ a cable contraint
  - Devised a model-based controller and tested in experiment.
:::
